statements: SELECT * FROM geolocation_info;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_info WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_description FROM geolocation_info WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT * FROM geolocation_info WHERE challenge_name = 'Adventure';
SELECT location_id, challenge_name, challenge_description FROM geolocation_info ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_info WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_description FROM geolocation_info WHERE longitude > 50;
SELECT * FROM geolocation_info WHERE latitude < 40 ORDER BY longitude DESC;
SELECT location_id, challenge_name FROM geolocation_info WHERE challenge_name LIKE '%challenge%' ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, challenge_name, challenge_description FROM geolocation_info WHERE location_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE challenge_id = 1;
SELECT challenge_name FROM challenge_data WHERE challenge_id = 2;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM geolocation_data WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT challenge_name, location_id FROM challenge_data;
SELECT * FROM geolocation_data WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT challenge_name, latitude, longitude FROM challenge_data INNER JOIN geolocation_data ON challenge_data.location_id = geolocation_data.location_id;
SELECT challenge_name, location_id FROM challenge_data WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM geolocation_data WHERE latitude < 0);
SELECT AVG(latitude) AS average_latitude, AVG(longitude) AS average_longitude FROM geolocation_data;
SELECT challenge_name, latitude, longitude FROM challenge_data WHERE challenge_name LIKE '%Challenge%' ORDER BY latitude DESC, longitude ASC;
SELECT * FROM Challenges;
SELECT challenge_name, location_lat, location_long FROM Challenges ORDER BY challenge_name DESC;
SELECT participant_name FROM Participants WHERE challenge_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT location_lat, location_long FROM Challenges WHERE location_lat < 40;
SELECT challenge_name, count(clue_id) AS total_clues FROM Challenges JOIN Clues ON Challenges.challenge_id = Clues.challenge_id GROUP BY Challenges.challenge_id;
SELECT * FROM Challenges WHERE challenge_id = 1;
SELECT challenge_name, location_lat, location_long FROM Challenges ORDER BY challenge_name ASC;
SELECT participant_name, challenge_name FROM Participants p JOIN Challenges c ON p.challenge_id = c.challenge_id;
SELECT c.challenge_name, COUNT(clue_id) AS clue_count FROM Challenges c LEFT JOIN Clues cl ON c.challenge_id = cl.challenge_id GROUP BY c.challenge_name;
SELECT * FROM Participants p JOIN Challenges c ON p.challenge_id = c.challenge_id JOIN Clues cl ON c.challenge_id = cl.challenge_id WHERE cl.clue_text LIKE '%find%';
SELECT * FROM challenge_locations;
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty FROM challenges;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty, completion_status FROM challenges JOIN player_progress ON challenges.challenge_id = player_progress.challenge_id;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM challenge_locations WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM challenge_locations WHERE latitude > 40 ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM challenges WHERE difficulty = 'Hard' AND challenge_id IN (SELECT challenge_id FROM player_progress WHERE completion_status = TRUE);
SELECT challenge_name, difficulty, location_name FROM challenges JOIN challenge_locations ON challenges.location_id = challenge_locations.location_id;
SELECT player_name, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM players JOIN player_progress ON players.player_id = player_progress.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM challenges;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_location_point FROM challenges ORDER BY challenge_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations WHERE latitude < 40.0;
SELECT hint_description, hint_order FROM hints WHERE challenge_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM challenges;
SELECT challenge_name, challenge_description, challenge_location_point FROM challenges WHERE challenge_id > 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT challenge_id, COUNT(user_id) AS num_users FROM challenges_users GROUP BY challenge_id HAVING num_users > 3;
